casebody.data:
[Civ. No. 3821. Second Appellate District, Division Two. July 19, 1922.] POLK McPHERSON, Respondent, v. J. C. WALLING et al., Appellants.

*793Ernest Walling and Power & McFadzean for Appellants.

J. A. Chase and Max B. Jamison for Respondent.

CRAIG, J.

The issues involved in this appeal are identically the same as those .in McPherson v. Walling, ante, p. 563 [209 Pac. 209]. The records were presented on appeal in one transcript. The reasons given in granting a reversal in that case apply to this, its companion case.

The judgment is reversed.

Finlayson, P. J., and Works, J., concurred.
